name: Mountain Peak Battle Mess
description:
High, high in the clouds, there is a small mountain. There are fierce battles. You are a warrior who must survive as long as possible. Everything depends on you.
-Endless game with permanent death.
-Get experience and upgrade your statuses.
-Funny and hard game.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
